parameter.name: surveyId
parameter.description: The survey id, which must be an id of a created survey from the website.

parameter.name: pageSize
parameter.description: Number of surveys to return per page.

parameter.name: startDate
parameter.description: Collectors must be created after this date

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.description: Collectors must be created before this date

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of survey to search against

parameter.name: isOrderAscending
parameter.description: If true sorts by creation time ASC, if false sorts by creation time DESC. Defaults to false

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: Additional fields to return. One or more of :[url, open, type, name, date_created, date_modified]
